summary: The agent report is mostly accurate and logical, with minor omissions in causal chain and metric details. Suggested actions are practical and relevant.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as a root cause but did not mention PowerHal.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured but lacks mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported VCORE and DDR percentages but missed some CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and MMDVFS is correctly ruled out, but the flow could be improved.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant to the identified issues.
